%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW reading_case_grouped

    AS

SELECT case_reference,
inspector_email,
inspector_name,
reader_email,
reader_name,
case_level,
date_submitted_by_inspector,
event_date,
type_of_reading,
procedure,
case_target_date,
reading_status,
able_to_read_decision,
advertisement,
appeal_against_conditions,
bespoke,
case_team_officer_email,
case_team_officer_name,
costs_decision,
green_belt,
kiosk,
linked,
neighbourhood_plan, 
nsi_email,
nsi_name,
prior_approval,
reason_for_delay,
redetermination,
secretary_of_state_report,
spa_sac_eps,
special_category_data,
specialisms,
telecommunications,
urgent,
amendments_received_notification_needed,
able_to_check_amendments,
amendments_cycles,
amendments_target_date,
amendments_timeliness_review_flag,
date_amendments_checked,
date_amendments_received,
date_cleared,
date_decision_sent_for_issue,
date_read,
date_read_started,
decision_read,
delayed_amendments_submission,
delayed_submission,
document_version,
document_version_needed,
final_decision_notification_needed,
notification_sent_flag,
on_hold_notification_needed,
on_hold_status, 
reading_complete_notification_needed,
reading_needed_flag,
ready_for_issue,
reason_for_amendments_delay,
recall_notification_needed,
replacement_decision_flag,
return_count,
revised_decision_notification_needed,
skim_read,
source,
timeliness_review_flag,
date_modified,
expected_from

FROM odw_standardised_db.checkmark_reading_case
Where case_reference is not null
GROUP BY case_reference,
inspector_email,
inspector_name,
reader_email,
reader_name,
case_level,
date_submitted_by_inspector,
event_date,
type_of_reading,
procedure,
case_target_date,
reading_status,
able_to_read_decision,
advertisement,
appeal_against_conditions,
bespoke,
case_team_officer_email,
case_team_officer_name,
costs_decision,
green_belt,
kiosk,
linked,
neighbourhood_plan, 
nsi_email,
nsi_name,
prior_approval,
reason_for_delay,
redetermination,
secretary_of_state_report,
spa_sac_eps,
special_category_data,
specialisms,
telecommunications,
urgent,
amendments_received_notification_needed,
able_to_check_amendments,
amendments_cycles,
amendments_target_date,
amendments_timeliness_review_flag,
date_amendments_checked,
date_amendments_received,
date_cleared,
date_decision_sent_for_issue,
date_read,
date_read_started,
decision_read,
delayed_amendments_submission,
delayed_submission,
document_version,
document_version_needed,
final_decision_notification_needed,
notification_sent_flag,
on_hold_notification_needed,
on_hold_status, 
reading_complete_notification_needed,
reading_needed_flag,
ready_for_issue,
reason_for_amendments_delay,
recall_notification_needed,
replacement_decision_flag,
return_count,
revised_decision_notification_needed,
skim_read,
source,
timeliness_review_flag,
date_modified,
expected_from

# Check for new, updated or deleted data
- This script checks for new, updated or deleted data by checking the source data (checkmark) against the target (odw_harmonised_db.comment_fact)
- **New Data:** where a TypeId in the source does not exist as an id in the target. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Updated data:** Comparison occurs on TypeId in source and id in target where the row hash is different i.e. there is a change in one of the columns. NewData flag is set to 'Y'
- **Deleted data:** where an id in the target exists but the same TypeId doesn't exist in the source. DeletedData flag is set to 'Y'

## View comment_type_reference_dim_new is created

%%sql
-- Build reading_case_dim table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW reading_case_dim_new

    AS

-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.case_reference IS NULL
        THEN T3.ReadingCaseID
        ELSE NULL
    END                                         AS ReadingCaseID, -- surrogate key
    T1.case_reference                           AS CaseReference,
    T1.inspector_email                          AS InspectorEmail,
    T1.inspector_name                           AS InspectorName,
    T1.reader_email                             AS ReaderEmail,
    T1.reader_name                              AS ReaderName,
    T1.case_level                               AS CaseLevel,
    T1.date_submitted_by_inspector              AS DateSubmittedByInspector,
    T1.event_date                               AS EventDate,
    T1.type_of_reading                          AS TypeOfReading,
    T1.procedure                                AS Procedure,
    T1.case_target_date                         AS CaseTargetDate,
    T1.reading_status                           AS ReadingStatus,
    T1.able_to_read_decision                    AS AbleToReadDecision,
    T1.advertisement                            AS Advertisement,
    T1.appeal_against_conditions                AS AppealAgainstConditions,
    T1.bespoke                                  AS Bespoke,
    T1.case_team_officer_email                  AS CaseTeamOfficerEmail,
    T1.case_team_officer_name                   AS CaseTeamOfficerName,
    T1.costs_decision                           AS CostsDecision,
    T1.green_belt                               AS GreenBelt,
    T1.kiosk                                    AS Kiosk,
    T1.linked                                   AS Linked,
    T1.neighbourhood_plan                       AS NeibourhoodPlan,
    T1.nsi_email                                AS NSIEmail,
    T1.nsi_name                                 AS NSIName,
    T1.prior_approval                           AS PriorApproval,
    T1.reason_for_delay                         AS ReasonForDelay,
    T1.redetermination                          AS Redetermination,
    T1.secretary_of_state_report                AS SecretaryOfStateReport,
    T1.spa_sac_eps                              AS SPASACEPS,
    T1.special_category_data                    AS SpecialCategoryData,
    T1.specialisms                              AS Specialisms,
    T1.telecommunications                       AS Telecommunications,
    T1.urgent                                   AS Urgent,
    T1.amendments_received_notification_needed  AS AmendmentsReceivedNotificationsNeeded,
    T1.able_to_check_amendments                 AS AbleToCheckAmendments,
    T1.amendments_cycles                        AS AmendmentsCycles,
    T1.amendments_target_date                   AS AmendmentsTargetDate,
    T1.amendments_timeliness_review_flag        AS AmendmentsTimelineReviewFlag,
    T1.date_amendments_checked                  AS DateAmendmentsChecked,
    T1.date_amendments_received                 AS DateAmendmentsReceived,
    T1.date_cleared                             AS DateCleared,
    T1.date_decision_sent_for_issue             AS DateDecisionSentForIssue,
    T1.date_read                                AS DateRead,
    T1.date_read_started                        AS DateReadStarted,
    T1.decision_read                            AS DecisionRead,
    T1.delayed_amendments_submission            AS DelayedAmendmentsSubmission,
    T1.delayed_submission                       AS DelayedSubmission,
    T1.document_version                         AS DocumentVersion,
    T1.document_version_needed                  AS DocumentVersionNeeded,
    T1.final_decision_notification_needed       AS FinalDecisionNotificationNeeded,
    T1.notification_sent_flag                   AS NotificationSentFlag,
    T1.on_hold_notification_needed              AS OnHoldNotificationNeeded,
    T1.on_hold_status                           AS OnHoldStatus,
    T1.reading_complete_notification_needed     AS ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
    T1.reading_needed_flag                      AS ReadingNeededFlag,
    T1.ready_for_issue                          AS ReadyForIssue,
    T1.reason_for_amendments_delay              AS ReasonForAmendmentsDelay,
    T1.recall_notification_needed               AS RecallNotificationNeeded,
    T1.replacement_decision_flag                AS ReplacementDecisionFlag,
    T1.return_count                             AS ReturnCount,
    T1.revised_decision_notification_needed     AS RevisedDecisionNotificationNeeded,
    T1.skim_read                                AS SkimRead,
    T1.source                                   AS Source,
    T1.timeliness_review_flag                   AS TimelinessReviewFlag,
    T1.date_modified                            AS DateModified,
    T2.SourceSystemID                           AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)              AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                                        AS ValidTo,
    md5(
        concat(
            IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.inspector_email,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.inspector_name,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.reader_email,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.reader_name,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.case_level,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.date_submitted_by_inspector,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.event_date,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.type_of_reading,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.case_target_date,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.reading_status,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.able_to_read_decision,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.advertisement,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.appeal_against_conditions,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.bespoke,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.case_team_officer_email,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.case_team_officer_name,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.costs_decision,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.green_belt,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.kiosk,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.linked,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.neighbourhood_plan,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.nsi_email,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.nsi_name,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.prior_approval,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.reason_for_delay,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.redetermination,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.secretary_of_state_report,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.spa_sac_eps,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.special_category_data,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.specialisms,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.telecommunications,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.urgent,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.amendments_received_notification_needed,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.able_to_check_amendments,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.amendments_cycles,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.amendments_target_date,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.amendments_timeliness_review_flag,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.date_amendments_checked,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.date_amendments_received,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.date_cleared,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.date_decision_sent_for_issue,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.date_read,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.date_read_started,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.decision_read,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.delayed_amendments_submission,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.delayed_submission,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.document_version,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.document_version_needed,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.final_decision_notification_needed,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.notification_sent_flag,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.on_hold_notification_needed,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.on_hold_status,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.reading_complete_notification_needed,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.reading_needed_flag,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.ready_for_issue,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.reason_for_amendments_delay,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.recall_notification_needed,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.replacement_decision_flag,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.return_count,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.revised_decision_notification_needed,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.skim_read,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.source,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.timeliness_review_flag,'.'), 
            IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.')
        ))                                      AS RowID,
    'Y'                                         AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                                 AS HistoricIsActive

FROM reading_case_grouped T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2 
    ON "Checkmark" = T2.Description
FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_dim T3 
    ON T1.case_reference = T3.CaseReference 
    AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'
WHERE
    -- flags new data        
        (CASE
            WHEN T1.case_reference = T3.CaseReference 
                AND md5(
                    concat( 
                        IFNULL(T1.case_reference,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.inspector_email,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.inspector_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.reader_email,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.reader_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.case_level,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_submitted_by_inspector,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.event_date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.type_of_reading,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.procedure,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.case_target_date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.reading_status,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.able_to_read_decision,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.advertisement,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.appeal_against_conditions,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.bespoke,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.case_team_officer_email,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.case_team_officer_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.costs_decision,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.green_belt,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.kiosk,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.linked,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.neighbourhood_plan,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.nsi_email,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.nsi_name,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.prior_approval,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.reason_for_delay,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.redetermination,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.secretary_of_state_report,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.spa_sac_eps,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.special_category_data,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.specialisms,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.telecommunications,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.urgent,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.amendments_received_notification_needed,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.able_to_check_amendments,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.amendments_cycles,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.amendments_target_date,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.amendments_timeliness_review_flag,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_amendments_checked,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_amendments_received,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_cleared,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_decision_sent_for_issue,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_read,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_read_started,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.decision_read,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.delayed_amendments_submission,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.delayed_submission,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.document_version,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.document_version_needed,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.final_decision_notification_needed,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.notification_sent_flag,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.on_hold_notification_needed,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.on_hold_status,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.reading_complete_notification_needed,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.reading_needed_flag,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.ready_for_issue,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.reason_for_amendments_delay,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.recall_notification_needed,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.replacement_decision_flag,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.return_count,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.revised_decision_notification_needed,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.skim_read,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.source,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.timeliness_review_flag,'.'), 
                        IFNULL(T1.date_modified,'.'))) <> T3.RowID
            THEN 'Y'
            WHEN T3.CaseReference IS NULL
            THEN 'Y'
            ELSE 'N'
        END  = 'Y' )
    AND T1.case_reference IS NOT NULL
    AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM reading_case_grouped)

# Dataset is created that contains changed data and corresponding target data
- This script combines data that has been updated, Deleted or is new, with corresponding target data
- View **table_dim_new** is unioned to the target data filter to only those rows where changes have been detected
## View table_dim_changed_rows is created

%%sql
-- Create new and updated dataset

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY  VIEW reading_case_changed_rows

    AS

-- gets updated, deleted and new rows 

Select 
    ReadingCaseID,
    CaseReference,
    InspectorEmail,
    InspectorName,
    ReaderEmail,
    ReaderName,
    CaseLevel,
    DateSubmittedByInspector,
    EventDate,
    TypeOfReading,
    Procedure,
    CaseTargetDate,
    ReadingStatus,
    AbleToReadDecision,
    Advertisement,
    AppealAgainstConditions,
    Bespoke,
    CaseTeamOfficerEmail,
    CaseTeamOfficerName,
    CostsDecision,
    GreenBelt,
    Kiosk,
    Linked,
    NeibourhoodPlan,
    NSIEmail,
    NSIName,
    PriorApproval,
    ReasonForDelay,
    Redetermination,
    SecretaryOfStateReport,
    SPASACEPS,
    SpecialCategoryData,
    Specialisms,
    Telecommunications,
    Urgent,
    AmendmentsReceivedNotificationsNeeded,
    AbleToCheckAmendments,
    AmendmentsCycles,
    AmendmentsTargetDate,
    AmendmentsTimelineReviewFlag,
    DateAmendmentsChecked,
    DateAmendmentsReceived,
    DateCleared,
    DateDecisionSentForIssue,
    DateRead,
    DateReadStarted,
    DecisionRead,
    DelayedAmendmentsSubmission,
    DelayedSubmission,
    DocumentVersion,
    DocumentVersionNeeded,
    FinalDecisionNotificationNeeded,
    NotificationSentFlag,
    OnHoldNotificationNeeded,
    OnHoldStatus,
    ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
    ReadingNeededFlag,
    ReadyForIssue,
    ReasonForAmendmentsDelay,
    RecallNotificationNeeded,
    ReplacementDecisionFlag,
    ReturnCount,
    RevisedDecisionNotificationNeeded,
    SkimRead,
    Source,
    TimelinessReviewFlag,
    DateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive


From reading_case_dim_new WHERE HistoricIsActive = 'Y' or HistoricIsActive IS NULL

    UNION ALL

-- gets original versions of updated rows so we can update EndDate and set IsActive flag to 'N'

SELECT
    ReadingCaseID,
    CaseReference,
    InspectorEmail,
    InspectorName,
    ReaderEmail,
    ReaderName,
    CaseLevel,
    DateSubmittedByInspector,
    EventDate,
    TypeOfReading,
    Procedure,
    CaseTargetDate,
    ReadingStatus,
    AbleToReadDecision,
    Advertisement,
    AppealAgainstConditions,
    Bespoke,
    CaseTeamOfficerEmail,
    CaseTeamOfficerName,
    CostsDecision,
    GreenBelt,
    Kiosk,
    Linked,
    NeibourhoodPlan,
    NSIEmail,
    NSIName,
    PriorApproval,
    ReasonForDelay,
    Redetermination,
    SecretaryOfStateReport,
    SPASACEPS,
    SpecialCategoryData,
    Specialisms,
    Telecommunications,
    Urgent,
    AmendmentsReceivedNotificationsNeeded,
    AbleToCheckAmendments,
    AmendmentsCycles,
    AmendmentsTargetDate,
    AmendmentsTimelineReviewFlag,
    DateAmendmentsChecked,
    DateAmendmentsReceived,
    DateCleared,
    DateDecisionSentForIssue,
    DateRead,
    DateReadStarted,
    DecisionRead,
    DelayedAmendmentsSubmission,
    DelayedSubmission,
    DocumentVersion,
    DocumentVersionNeeded,
    FinalDecisionNotificationNeeded,
    NotificationSentFlag,
    OnHoldNotificationNeeded,
    OnHoldStatus,
    ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
    ReadingNeededFlag,
    ReadyForIssue,
    ReasonForAmendmentsDelay,
    RecallNotificationNeeded,
    ReplacementDecisionFlag,
    ReturnCount,
    RevisedDecisionNotificationNeeded,
    SkimRead,
    Source,
    TimelinessReviewFlag,
    DateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_dim
WHERE InspectorName IN (SELECT InspectorName FROM reading_case_dim_new WHERE CaseReference IS NULL)
AND IsActive = 'Y';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW Loading_month

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    IngestionDate AS IngestionDate,
    to_timestamp(date_sub(IngestionDate,1)) AS ClosingDate,
    'Y' AS IsActive

FROM reading_case_dim_new;

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW reading_case_changed_rows_final

    AS

SELECT 
    ReadingCaseID,
    CaseReference,
    InspectorEmail,
    InspectorName,
    ReaderEmail,
    ReaderName,
    CaseLevel,
    DateSubmittedByInspector,
    EventDate,
    TypeOfReading,
    Procedure,
    CaseTargetDate,
    ReadingStatus,
    AbleToReadDecision,
    Advertisement,
    AppealAgainstConditions,
    Bespoke,
    CaseTeamOfficerEmail,
    CaseTeamOfficerName,
    CostsDecision,
    GreenBelt,
    Kiosk,
    Linked,
    NeibourhoodPlan,
    NSIEmail,
    NSIName,
    PriorApproval,
    ReasonForDelay,
    Redetermination,
    SecretaryOfStateReport,
    SPASACEPS,
    SpecialCategoryData,
    Specialisms,
    Telecommunications,
    Urgent,
    AmendmentsReceivedNotificationsNeeded,
    AbleToCheckAmendments,
    AmendmentsCycles,
    AmendmentsTargetDate,
    AmendmentsTimelineReviewFlag,
    DateAmendmentsChecked,
    DateAmendmentsReceived,
    DateCleared,
    DateDecisionSentForIssue,
    DateRead,
    DateReadStarted,
    DecisionRead,
    DelayedAmendmentsSubmission,
    DelayedSubmission,
    DocumentVersion,
    DocumentVersionNeeded,
    FinalDecisionNotificationNeeded,
    NotificationSentFlag,
    OnHoldNotificationNeeded,
    OnHoldStatus,
    ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
    ReadingNeededFlag,
    ReadyForIssue,
    ReasonForAmendmentsDelay,
    RecallNotificationNeeded,
    ReplacementDecisionFlag,
    ReturnCount,
    RevisedDecisionNotificationNeeded,
    SkimRead,
    Source,
    TimelinessReviewFlag,
    DateModified,
    T1.SourceSystemID,
    T1.IngestionDate,
    T1.ValidTo,
    T1.RowID,
    T1.IsActive,
    T2.ClosingDate
FROM reading_case_changed_rows T1
FULL JOIN Loading_month T2 ON T1.IsActive = T2.IsActive

# View table_dim_changed_rows is used in a merge (Upsert) statement into the target table
- **WHEN MATCHED** ON the Business Key (i.e. table from Personal Characteristics), EndDate is set to today -1 day and the IsActive flag is set to 'N'
- **WHEN NOT MATCHED** ON the business key, insert rows
## Table odw_harmonised.table_dim is updated

%%sql

-- merge into fact table

MERGE INTO odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_dim AS Target
USING reading_case_changed_rows_final AS Source

ON Source.ReadingCaseID = Target.ReadingCaseID

-- For Updates existing rows
WHEN MATCHED
    THEN 
    UPDATE SET
    Target.ValidTo = to_timestamp(ClosingDate),
    Target.IsActive = 'N'

-- Insert completely new rows
WHEN NOT MATCHED 
    THEN INSERT (ReadingCaseID,
        CaseReference,
        InspectorEmail,
        InspectorName,
        ReaderEmail,
        ReaderName,
        CaseLevel,
        DateSubmittedByInspector,
        EventDate,
        TypeOfReading,
        Procedure,
        CaseTargetDate,
        ReadingStatus,
        AbleToReadDecision,
        Advertisement,
        AppealAgainstConditions,
        Bespoke,
        CaseTeamOfficerEmail,
        CaseTeamOfficerName,
        CostsDecision,
        GreenBelt,
        Kiosk,
        Linked,
        NeibourhoodPlan,
        NSIEmail,
        NSIName,
        PriorApproval,
        ReasonForDelay,
        Redetermination,
        SecretaryOfStateReport,
        SPASACEPS,
        SpecialCategoryData,
        Specialisms,
        Telecommunications,
        Urgent,
        AmendmentsReceivedNotificationsNeeded,
        AbleToCheckAmendments,
        AmendmentsCycles,
        AmendmentsTargetDate,
        AmendmentsTimelineReviewFlag,
        DateAmendmentsChecked,
        DateAmendmentsReceived,
        DateCleared,
        DateDecisionSentForIssue,
        DateRead,
        DateReadStarted,
        DecisionRead,
        DelayedAmendmentsSubmission,
        DelayedSubmission,
        DocumentVersion,
        DocumentVersionNeeded,
        FinalDecisionNotificationNeeded,
        NotificationSentFlag,
        OnHoldNotificationNeeded,
        OnHoldStatus,
        ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
        ReadingNeededFlag,
        ReadyForIssue,
        ReasonForAmendmentsDelay,
        RecallNotificationNeeded,
        ReplacementDecisionFlag,
        ReturnCount,
        RevisedDecisionNotificationNeeded,
        SkimRead,
        Source,
        TimelinessReviewFlag,
        DateModified,
        SourceSystemID,
        IngestionDate,
        ValidTo,
        RowID,
        IsActive)  
        VALUES (Source.ReadingCaseID,
        Source.CaseReference,
        Source.InspectorEmail,
        Source.InspectorName,
        Source.ReaderEmail,
        Source.ReaderName,
        Source.CaseLevel,
        Source.DateSubmittedByInspector,
        Source.EventDate,
        Source.TypeOfReading,
        Source.Procedure,
        Source.CaseTargetDate,
        Source.ReadingStatus,
        Source.AbleToReadDecision,
        Source.Advertisement,
        Source.AppealAgainstConditions,
        Source.Bespoke,
        Source.CaseTeamOfficerEmail,
        Source.CaseTeamOfficerName,
        Source.CostsDecision,
        Source.GreenBelt,
        Source.Kiosk,
        Source.Linked,
        Source.NeibourhoodPlan,
        Source.NSIEmail,
        Source.NSIName,
        Source.PriorApproval,
        Source.ReasonForDelay,
        Source.Redetermination,
        Source.SecretaryOfStateReport,
        Source.SPASACEPS,
        Source.SpecialCategoryData,
        Source.Specialisms,
        Source.Telecommunications,
        Source.Urgent,
        Source.AmendmentsReceivedNotificationsNeeded,
        Source.AbleToCheckAmendments,
        Source.AmendmentsCycles,
        Source.AmendmentsTargetDate,
        Source.AmendmentsTimelineReviewFlag,
        Source.DateAmendmentsChecked,
        Source.DateAmendmentsReceived,
        Source.DateCleared,
        Source.DateDecisionSentForIssue,
        Source.DateRead,
        Source.DateReadStarted,
        Source.DecisionRead,
        Source.DelayedAmendmentsSubmission,
        Source.DelayedSubmission,
        Source.DocumentVersion,
        Source.DocumentVersionNeeded,
        Source.FinalDecisionNotificationNeeded,
        Source.NotificationSentFlag,
        Source.OnHoldNotificationNeeded,
        Source.OnHoldStatus,
        Source.ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
        Source.ReadingNeededFlag,
        Source.ReadyForIssue,
        Source.ReasonForAmendmentsDelay,
        Source.RecallNotificationNeeded,
        Source.ReplacementDecisionFlag,
        Source.ReturnCount,
        Source.RevisedDecisionNotificationNeeded,
        Source.SkimRead,
        Source.Source,
        Source.TimelinessReviewFlag,
        Source.DateModified,
        Source.SourceSystemID, 
        Source.IngestionDate, 
        Source.ValidTo, 
        Source.RowID, 
        Source.IsActive)

# Fix the IDs
- No auto-increment feature is available in delta tables, therefore we need to create new IDs for the inserted rows
- This is done by select the target data and using INSERT OVERWRITE to re-insert the data is a new Row Number
## Table odw_harmonised.table_dim is updated

%%sql
-- Insert new tableID

INSERT OVERWRITE odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_dim

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ReadingCaseID NULLS LAST) AS ReadingCaseID, 
    CaseReference,
    InspectorEmail,
    InspectorName,
    ReaderEmail,
    ReaderName,
    CaseLevel,
    DateSubmittedByInspector,
    EventDate,
    TypeOfReading,
    Procedure,
    CaseTargetDate,
    ReadingStatus,
    AbleToReadDecision,
    Advertisement,
    AppealAgainstConditions,
    Bespoke,
    CaseTeamOfficerEmail,
    CaseTeamOfficerName,
    CostsDecision,
    GreenBelt,
    Kiosk,
    Linked,
    NeibourhoodPlan,
    NSIEmail,
    NSIName,
    PriorApproval,
    ReasonForDelay,
    Redetermination,
    SecretaryOfStateReport,
    SPASACEPS,
    SpecialCategoryData,
    Specialisms,
    Telecommunications,
    Urgent,
    AmendmentsReceivedNotificationsNeeded,
    AbleToCheckAmendments,
    AmendmentsCycles,
    AmendmentsTargetDate,
    AmendmentsTimelineReviewFlag,
    DateAmendmentsChecked,
    DateAmendmentsReceived,
    DateCleared,
    DateDecisionSentForIssue,
    DateRead,
    DateReadStarted,
    DecisionRead,
    DelayedAmendmentsSubmission,
    DelayedSubmission,
    DocumentVersion,
    DocumentVersionNeeded,
    FinalDecisionNotificationNeeded,
    NotificationSentFlag,
    OnHoldNotificationNeeded,
    OnHoldStatus,
    ReadingCompleteNotificationNeeded,
    ReadingNeededFlag,
    ReadyForIssue,
    ReasonForAmendmentsDelay,
    RecallNotificationNeeded,
    ReplacementDecisionFlag,
    ReturnCount,
    RevisedDecisionNotificationNeeded,
    SkimRead,
    Source,
    TimelinessReviewFlag,
    DateModified,
    SourceSystemID,
    IngestionDate,
    ValidTo,
    RowID,
    IsActive
FROM odw_harmonised_db.checkmark_reading_case_dim;
